name: Avieon
tag_list: semi-conductor, video, wireless, processor, mobile, smart-phones, video-surveillance, video-conferencing, hdtv
overview:
Avieon offers silicon-proven IP for the next generation wireless multi-media revolution. It licenses breakthrough media signal processors intellectual property (IP) that handles compute-intensive video & wireless tasks at very low-power levels with high scalability. Avieonâ€™s product offerings are geared towards OEM, ODM, semiconductor and SoC companies to provide them a significantly enhanced audio and video experience at much lower manufacturing cost.

Avieonâ€™s patent-pending multi-media signal processor, the Neuron MSP includes a unique SIDO (same instruction, different operation) architecture. Avieon’s IP allows portable device manufacturers to add latest Mobile TV, gaming and other video capabilities on wireless bandwidth by leveraging the programmable nature of MSP.

Target applications range from mobile / smart phones, video surveillance, video conferencing to the highest-quality HDTV. MSPs are sold as silicon-proven IP with complete reference implementations of major audio, video and wireless algorithms, including H.264, WMV9, FFT and others. Avieon is helping semiconductor and OEM companies deploy innovative products with compelling features at the lowest cost.
